column1: Kata Robata////After reading rave reviews and passing by this place a million times
column2: I decided to give it a try once and for all. Unfortunately
column3: I was definitely left disappointed... I don't know whether it was the okay service or the not-so-great food
column4: but I was not happy. The atmosphere and decor is undoubtedly great
column5: the happy hour menu is below average
column6: and apart from the awesome appetizers
column7: the sushi rolls were not so appetizing.
